Signals¶

bhp_lab_tracker uses a post_save() signal to catch modifications to models registered in a modules with a :file”lab_tracker.py.

bhp_lab_tracker.models.signals.tracker_on_post_delete(sender, instance, **kwargs)[source]¶

Deletes from the lab_tracker history for a model instance on post-save for model instances whose class is registered in site_lab_tracker.

bhp_lab_tracker.models.signals.tracker_on_post_save(sender, instance, **kwargs)[source]¶

Updates the lab_tracker history on post-save for model instances whose class is registered in site_lab_tracker.
